name: Cardiovascular
description: Cardiovascular endurance exercises to improve stamina and heart health.

workout_groups.name: Cardiovascular Endurance
workout_groups.description: Improve stamina, heart health, and overall cardiovascular endurance with home-friendly exercises.

workouts.name: Jump Rope Intervals
workouts.description: Perform jump rope intervals, alternating between high and low intensity.

workouts.name: Stair Climb Drill
workouts.description: Climb stairs continuously at a steady pace for endurance training.

workouts.name: High-Knee Sprints
workouts.description: Sprint in place with high knees as fast as possible.

workouts.name: Burpee Marathon
workouts.description: Perform as many burpees as possible with minimal rest.

workouts.name: Shadowboxing Endurance
workouts.description: Throw non-stop punches with footwork for sustained endurance training.
